name: FNF - Vs. PomPom and Mackie Full Week
name_original: FNF - Vs. PomPom and Mackie Full Week
description:
You just seem to keep running into trouble, and all you wanna do is kiss your girlfriend! In an act of desperation, you take to the outskirts of town and into a nearby forest to finally have a proper date. Things are going swell until- What's this? What's a kid doing here? And of course, they want to battle you too.

Guess there's no other choice. Surely she won't cause too much trouble.
